This is my first Markdown document.

Let's load some data.

```{r}
library(datasets)
data(airquality)
summary(airquality)
```

Here's a pairs plot of the data.

```{r}
pairs(airquality)
```

Here's a regression model of ozone on some predictors.

```{r}
fit <- lm(Ozone ~ Solar.R + Wind + Temp, data = airquality)
summary(fit)
```
